name: HowManyBeers
0:
”Alexa, open How Many Beers”
”Alexa, start How Many Beers”
”Alexa, launch How Many Beers”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how many beers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A 12 oz glass of beer that is 5% alcohol is considered one standard drink. How many beers is a 16 oz can of a Hazy New England Double IPA that is 8% alcohol? This Alexa skill will tell you that it is 2.13 beers (standard drinks).

This skill will help you figure out many beers you are actually drinking.

Be smart.

Disclaimer: This voice skill is for entertainment purposes only. Please drink responsibly.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
